verses.verse: מִזְמ֡וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm שִׁיר־ <S%H7892><s%> [and] Song חֲנֻכַּ֖ת <S%H2598><s%> [at] the dedication הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ <S%H7311><s%> I will extol יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> thee O LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for דִלִּיתָ֑נִי <S%H1802><s%> for thou hast lifted me up וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not שִׂמַּ֖חְתָּ <S%H8055><s%> to rejoice אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> and hast not made my foes לִֽי׃
יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱלֹהָ֑י <S%H430><s%> my God שִׁוַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7768><s%> I cried אֵ֝לֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> and וַתִּרְפָּאֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7495><s%> unto thee and thou hast healed

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD הֶֽעֱלִ֣יתָ <S%H5927><s%> thou hast brought up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from שְׁא֣וֹל <S%H7585><s%> from the grave נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> my soul חִ֝יִּיתַ֗נִי <S%H2421><s%> thou hast kept me alive [מִיֹּורְדֵי־ כ] (מִיָּֽרְדִי־ <S%H3381><s%> go בֽוֹר׃ <S%H3381><s%> go ק)

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> Sing לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD חֲסִידָ֑יו <S%H2623><s%> O ye saints וְ֝הוֹד֗וּ <S%H3034><s%> of his and give thanks לְזֵ֣כֶר <S%H2143><s%> at the remembrance קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> of his holiness

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for רֶ֨גַע ׀ <S%H7281><s%> [endureth but] a moment בְּאַפּוֹ֮ <S%H639><s%> For his anger חַיִּ֪ים <S%H2416><s%> [is] life בִּרְצ֫וֹנ֥וֹ <S%H7522><s%> in his favour בָּ֭עֶרֶב <S%H6153><s%> for a night יָלִ֥ין <S%H3885><s%> may endure בֶּ֗כִי <S%H1065><s%> weeping וְלַבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> [cometh] in the morning רִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> but joy
וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> I אָמַ֣רְתִּי <S%H559><s%> I said בְשַׁלְוִ֑י <S%H7959><s%> And in my prosperity בַּל־ <S%H1077><s%> lest אֶמּ֥וֹט <S%H4131><s%> be moved לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> I shall never

יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD בִּרְצוֹנְךָ֮ <S%H7522><s%> by thy favour הֶעֱמַ֪דְתָּה <S%H5975><s%> to stand לְֽהַרְרִ֫י <S%H2042><s%> thou hast made my mountain עֹ֥ז <S%H5797><s%> strong הִסְתַּ֥רְתָּ <S%H5641><s%> thou didst hide פָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thy face הָיִ֥יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become נִבְהָֽל׃ <S%H926><s%> [and] I was troubled

אֵלֶ֣יךָ <S%H413><s%> to you יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to thee O LORD אֶקְרָ֑א <S%H7121><s%> I cried וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> the Lord אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <S%H2603><s%> I made supplication

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> What בֶּ֥צַע <S%H1215><s%> What profit בְּדָמִי֮ <S%H1818><s%> [is there] in my blood בְּרִדְתִּ֪י <S%H3381><s%> when I go down אֶ֫ל־ <S%H413><s%> about שָׁ֥חַת <S%H7845><s%> corruption הֲיוֹדְךָ֥ <S%H3034><s%> praise עָפָ֑ר <S%H6083><s%> ashes הֲיַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> thee? shall it declare אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H571><s%> assured

שְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD וְחָנֵּ֑נִי <S%H2603><s%> and have mercy יְ֝הוָה <S%H3068><s%> upon me LORD הֱ‍ֽיֵה־ <S%H1961><s%> become עֹזֵ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> be thou my helper לִֽי׃

הָפַ֣כְתָּ <S%H2015><s%> Thou hast turned מִסְפְּדִי֮ <S%H4553><s%> for me my mourning לְמָח֪וֹל <S%H4234><s%> into dancing לִ֥י פִּתַּ֥חְתָּ <S%H6605><s%> thou hast put off שַׂקִּ֑י <S%H8242><s%> my sackcloth וַֽתְּאַזְּרֵ֥נִי <S%H247><s%> and girded שִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> me with gladness

לְמַ֤עַן ׀ <S%H4616><s%> because of יְזַמֶּרְךָ֣ <S%H2167><s%> may sing כָ֭בוֹד <S%H3519><s%> To the end that [my] glory וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִדֹּ֑ם <S%H1826><s%> praise to thee and not be silent יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD אֱ֝לֹהַ֗י <S%H430><s%> my God לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> unto thee for ever אוֹדֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H3034><s%> I will give thanks
